Name: Absorption: Sunlight Bud
Desc:
Dragon Vein Skill, Absorption Skill
When Spirit Sprinkling hits, the Rthul Spirits are gathered to attack by chasing the enemies as the hot sun breathes condensed fireball. The fireball tracks the boss monster in range; and if there are many boss monsters, it tracks the monster with the highest HP first.

H.Old:
When Spirit Sprinkling hits for timesec, Rthul Spirit shows up to attack by breathing 5 fireballs, and the fireball tracks the surrounding enemies to attack at 265% damage 6 times
If multiple fireballs hit one enemy, the final DMG decreases by 40% from the second fireball
Cooldown: tsec.
H.New:
When Spirit Sprinkling hits for 90 sec., the Rthul Spirit appears to attack by breathing 5 fireballs, and the fireball tracks the surrounding enemies to attack at 265% Damage 6 times.
If a single enemy is attacked by multiple fireballs, Final Damage -40% for each subsequent fireballs after the first one.
Cooldown: 2.5 sec.
